抈字的基本解释

抈
yuè
折断：“车轴折，其衡抈。”
动摇：“其为德也深矣，其为本也固矣，故不可抈也。”

抈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuè］
［《廣韻》魚厥切，入月，疑。］
(1)折断。
(2)折叠。
(3)通“扤”。动摇。

抈字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　抈； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页420第18
【唐韻】【集韻】?魚厥切，音月。【說文】折也。【揚子·太?經】車軸折。其衡抈。　又動也。【晉語】其置本也固矣。故不可抈也。　又【集韻】五活切，玩入聲。義同。

抈字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
抈字的起名意思

暂无。

抈
Basic explanation of words
抈
yuè
Broken: "The axle is broken, and its balance is broken."
Shake: "It's morality is profound, and its foundation is also solid, so it's not a good idea."
抈
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuè］
["Guangyun" Yu Jue cuts, enters the moon, suspicious. ]
(1) Broken.
(2) Folding.
(3) Through "扤". shake.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji] [Hand Character Department] 　抈; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 420, 18
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Yu Jue cut, sound moon. [Said the text] Zhe also. 【Yangtze·Tai Jing】Axle folding. It's worthy.　Move again. [Jin dialect] Its holdings are also solid. Therefore, it is not acceptable.　[Jiyun] Five lively, playful sounds. The same meaning.
